tarotCard.title: Tarot Reading
tarotCard.description: Embark on a journey into the mysterious world of cards. Find mystical answers to your questions about love, career and life.

home.footerText: Journey into the depths of your inner world in the light of mystical knowledge. Every reading offers you a new perspective and guidance.

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.subtitle: Discover your number's guidance with your name and birth date.

birthdayMeanings.1:
People born on the 1st come into the world with a strong sense of individuality. From early in life, they feel the need to chart their own path, make independent decisions, and lead. The spark burning within them constantly guides them toward new beginnings and new opportunities. These individuals are courageous, determined, and often become examples to those around them with their pioneering ideas.

However, this strong leadership energy can sometimes turn into an overly self-centered or authoritarian attitude. People born on the 1st risk isolation if they don't learn to collaborate with others. When balanced, they become a guiding light in both their own lives and the lives of others.
birthdayMeanings.2:
Those born on the 2nd come into the world with energy built on harmony, balance, and relationships. They are natural mediators with unique abilities in resolving conflicts, bringing different parties together, and creating collaborative environments. In their lives, they typically seek mutual understanding, intimacy, and emotional depth.

On the other hand, this sensitivity can make them easily hurt. The desire to over-accommodate can cause them to put their own desires in the background. When they find healthy balance, they become a reliable and supportive guide for others.
birthdayMeanings.3:
People born on the 3rd come to life's stage with a creative, energetic, and joyful spirit. Their strongest aspect is their ability to express themselves; they can showcase themselves in art, writing, speaking, or design. They easily stand out in social relationships and become a light that inspires people.

However, they may sometimes show tendencies to be superficial or scattered. Lack of discipline in their lives can prevent them from fully utilizing their talents. When focused, they release tremendous creativity and energy that brings happiness to people.
birthdayMeanings.4:
Those born on the 4th are people who bring order, discipline, and structure. They are reliable, hardworking, and responsible individuals. When faced with difficulties, they progress patiently and systematically. They want to build a solid foundation for their lives and create stability for both themselves and their loved ones.

At times, they can be rigid, stubborn, or overly controlling. This can make flexibility difficult in relationships. When they develop flexibility, they achieve lasting success by building a solid structure in both their own lives and their surroundings.
birthdayMeanings.5:
Those born on the 5th are representatives of freedom, adventure, and change. They constantly seek new experiences and are nourished by meeting different cultures and people. They learn quickly and easily adapt to the changes life brings. They add excitement, novelty, and vitality to their surroundings.

However, this need for freedom can sometimes turn into impatience, disorder, or fear of commitment. They don't want to limit themselves. But when they learn to balance freedom with responsibility, their lives become an inspiring journey of discovery.
birthdayMeanings.6:
People born on the 6th carry love, harmony, and responsibility energy. They feel deep loyalty to their families, friends, and community. Their helpfulness, aesthetic understanding, and desire to create beauty make them a reliable haven for others.

Sometimes they may have tendencies toward excessive self-sacrifice, neglecting their own needs, or taking on others' problems. When they learn to protect their own boundaries, they become a healing force for both themselves and their environment.
birthdayMeanings.7:
Those born on the 7th are investigative, deep-thinking, and intuitive individuals. They have a spirit that questions life and seeks the mystery behind truth. They are interested in science, philosophy, mysticism, or spiritual subjects. Their inner world is strong, and solitude can be nourishing for them.

However, they may have tendencies toward excessive introversion, coldness, or distancing. When they learn to form emotional bonds with others, they become a teacher who illuminates others with their wisdom.
birthdayMeanings.8:
People born on the 8th are representatives of power, management, and material success. They have a natural talent in business, organization, and strategy. They are goal-oriented and can achieve great success through determined work.

However, ambition and the pursuit of power can sometimes make them appear harsh or authoritarian. When they learn to balance spirituality with materiality, they create abundance in their own lives and become fair leaders for others.
birthdayMeanings.9:
Those born on the 9th are compassionate, idealistic, and artistic-spirited individuals. They place serving humanity, sharing goodness and beauty at the center of their lives. With their creative aspects, they can make a difference in society and touch others' lives.

Sometimes they can be overly emotional, dreamy, or self-sacrificing. However, when they live by observing their own boundaries and realities, they become humanitarian leaders who leave a lasting mark on the world.
birthdayMeanings.11:
Those born on the 11th are intuitive, visionary, and spiritually strong individuals. Their energy operates at high frequency and inspires those around them. With their innate awareness, it's possible for them to feel divine guidance in their lives.

However, this intense energy can make them restless, anxious, or unbalanced. When they ground themselves, they become a light that inspires and guides those around them.
birthdayMeanings.22:
Those born on the 22nd are builders of great visions. They have the ability to transform powerful dreams into reality. Thanks to their disciplined, practical, and determined nature, they can achieve great success in both material and spiritual worlds.

But this great energy can create pressure of responsibility. When they don't settle for small goals, they leave lasting marks on the world by building great projects.
birthdayMeanings.33:
Those born on the 33rd are carriers of unconditional love, compassion, and healing energy. They are individuals who live for the good of others, feeling deep responsibility and self-sacrifice. They inspire people, soften hearts, and guide communities.

However, this high energy can create pressure of obligation. When they learn to express themselves without exhausting themselves, they leave a lasting healing mark on the world and contribute to the collective healing.

lifePathMeanings.1:
Life Path 1 individuals come into life with leadership, independence, and pioneering energy. They carry the desire to chart their own course, generate new ideas, and guide those around them. They often have an entrepreneurial, courageous, and visionary nature. In their lives, they frequently feel the need to come to the forefront and strongly express their own identity.

However, this energy can sometimes reflect as selfishness, impatience, or authoritarianism. When they are open to collaboration and recognize others' leadership as well, they achieve great success and inspiring beginnings in their lives.
lifePathMeanings.2:
Life Path 2 individuals come into the world with harmony, diplomacy, and sensitivity. They have a strong ability in mediation, bringing different parties together, and maintaining peace. They are generally perceived as gentle, compassionate, and supportive energy in their environment. Relationships are very important to them and usually take center stage in life.

However, excessive sensitivity can sometimes turn into lack of self-confidence or dependence on others. When they establish balance, they become a true guide who brings peace and understanding to both themselves and others.
lifePathMeanings.3:
Life Path 3 individuals come to life with a creative, energetic, and joyful spirit. Expression, communication, and art are natural areas for them. They often inspire those around them with their conversations, writings, or stage talents. The vitality they carry within allows them to enjoy life and bring joy to others.

However, this energy can also manifest as superficiality, disorganization, or wastefulness. When combined with discipline, 3 spreads the light of creativity and joy in both their own life and the lives of others.
lifePathMeanings.4:
Life Path 4 individuals live with energy that brings order, discipline, and structure. They are patient, hardworking, and reliable individuals. They make long-term plans, lay solid foundations, and play a strong role in building lasting successes. Thanks to their practical intelligence and stable attitude, they know how to overcome difficulties.

However, this energy can also cast shadows as rigid rules, lack of flexibility, or stubbornness. When they adapt to change, they achieve lasting success that is both reliable and open to innovation.
lifePathMeanings.5:
Life Path 5 individuals are representatives of freedom, adventure, and change. They move through life with a constant quest for discovery. Meeting new cultures, experiences, and people nourishes their soul. Since they easily adapt to change, they can be pioneers in bringing innovative ideas to life.

However, impatience, indecision, and instability are their shadow aspects. When they learn to balance freedom with responsibility, their lives become an exciting journey for both themselves and their environment.
lifePathMeanings.6:
Life Path 6 individuals come to life with responsibility, family, and love energy. They have a strong desire to help others, adapt, and create beauty. They are known as protective, supportive, and reliable energy in their environment. Their aesthetic understanding and ability to create harmony are strong.

However, they may have tendencies toward excessive self-sacrifice or taking on others' problems. When they learn to also consider their own needs, they become a healing force for both themselves and others.
lifePathMeanings.7:
Life Path 7 individuals are nourished by introspection, research, and spirituality. They seek the deep meanings of life, question the unseen, and guide with their intuition. Science, philosophy, spiritual fields, or the depths of art attract them. Silence and solitude are areas that nourish their inner wisdom.

However, there may be tendencies toward excessive introversion or appearing cold. When they establish balanced connections with others, they become a guide who illuminates their environment with their wisdom.
lifePathMeanings.8:
Life Path 8 individuals come into the world with power, success, and management energy. They have a natural skill in business, organization, and leadership. They progress determinedly toward their goals and have high potential for achieving material success. When used correctly, they can create abundance and prosperity.

However, ambition, desire for control, or authoritarian attitude can be shadow aspects. When they balance material and spiritual, they achieve lasting success as a fair and strong leader.
lifePathMeanings.9:
Life Path 9 individuals move with compassion, idealism, and love for humanity. They want to make the world a better place and contribute to society with self-sacrifice. Their artistic aspects can be strong and they can create projects that touch others' lives.

However, they may have tendencies toward being overly emotional, dreamy, or excessively self-sacrificing. When they protect their own boundaries and combine realism with idealism, they become humanitarian leaders who leave lasting marks on the world.
lifePathMeanings.11:
Life Path 11 individuals carry high intuition, vision, and inspiration energy. They have an innate spiritual awareness and are strong in inspiring those around them. They can guide people with their visions and contribute to the collective with their divine guidance.

However, this intense energy can create anxiety, restlessness, or imbalance. When they balance themselves, they become both a light-shining guide and a visionary who brings healing to their environment.
lifePathMeanings.22:
Life Path 22 individuals are known as master builders. They have the power to transform great dreams into reality. Thanks to their practical, disciplined, and visionary nature, they can build lasting projects in the world. They have the potential to create both material and spiritual success simultaneously.

However, this great energy can sometimes create heavy responsibility pressure. When they don't settle for small goals, they reveal their potential to leave a lasting legacy in the world.
lifePathMeanings.33:
Life Path 33 individuals carry unconditional love, compassion, and service energy. They come into the world with a spirit that mediates others' healing and guides society. With their teaching aspects, compassionate attitudes, and high energy, they illuminate their environment.

However, this intense energy can sometimes create excessive self-sacrifice or burnout risk. When they protect their own boundaries and express their love in a balanced way, they become a powerful figure who offers healing and guidance in the world.

expressionMeanings.1:
Expression Number 1 individuals direct their lives with strong leadership and individuality energy. They generate creative ideas, open their own paths, and become examples to others. Thanks to their innate determination and self-confidence, taking initiatives, starting new projects, and taking risks is a natural process for them.

However, this strong energy can sometimes show its shadow side as selfishness, impatience, or authoritarianism. When they learn cooperation and value others' ideas, they leave great successes and lasting impacts on their life paths.
expressionMeanings.2:
Expression Number 2 individuals carry harmony, cooperation, and diplomacy energy. They are naturally talented in bringing different parties together, resolving conflicts, and creating balance. They stand out as gentle, kind, and supportive presences in their environment.

However, excessive desire to accommodate can sometimes lead them to suppress their own needs. When they learn to set their own boundaries, they become a healing force both in their relationships and within the community.
expressionMeanings.3:
Expression Number 3 individuals shine with creativity, communication, and joy energy. They express themselves strongly in areas such as writing, speaking, art, and design. They easily stand out in social relationships and become a light that inspires people.

However, disorganization or superficiality can prevent them from fully using their potential. When combined with discipline, Expression Number 3 individuals achieve great success and become a source of happiness and inspiration for their environment.
expressionMeanings.4:
Expression Number 4 individuals are known for order, stability, and hard work energy. They lay solid foundations, fulfill their responsibilities, and achieve lasting success in long-term projects. Their environment sees them as reliable and disciplined people.

However, being too rigid or stubborn, resisting change can be their shadow aspects. When they gain flexibility, they add lasting value to both themselves and others with their strong structuring energy.
expressionMeanings.5:
Expression Number 5 individuals are representatives of freedom, adventure, and change. They direct themselves with great desire toward new experiences, different cultures, and discoveries. They learn quickly, adapt to different areas, and add vitality to their environment.

However, impatience or disorder can pull them to weak ground. When they balance their desire for freedom with responsibility consciousness, their lives become an inspiring journey for both themselves and others.
expressionMeanings.6:
Expression Number 6 individuals carry love, harmony, and responsibility energy. They feel strong loyalty to their families, society, and environment. Thanks to their helpfulness, aesthetic understanding, and desire to create beauty, they become reliable figures in their environment.

However, they may have tendencies toward excessive self-sacrifice or taking on others' problems. When they protect their own boundaries, they become a power that heals both their loved ones and society.
expressionMeanings.7:
Expression Number 7 individuals have knowledge, research, and spiritual depth energy. They question the meaning of life, seek invisible truths, and guide with their intuition. They are often drawn to science, philosophy, or spiritual fields.

However, excessive introversion or distant stance can create difficulties in relationships. When they learn to share their inner wisdom with others, they become valuable guides who illuminate their environment.
expressionMeanings.8:
Expression Number 8 individuals live with power, success, and management energy. They have natural skills in business, financial fields, and leadership. Thanks to their determination, they have high potential for achieving great goals.

However, ambition or excessive desire for control can be shadow aspects. When they balance material success with spiritual values, they leave great marks as strong and fair leaders.
expressionMeanings.9:
Expression Number 9 individuals move with idealism, compassion, and love for humanity. They value serving humanity, touching others' lives, and contributing to society through artistic projects. They are known as helpful and visionary in their environment.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or idealism can wear them out. When they learn to offer their compassion while maintaining realism, they become humanitarian leaders who leave lasting marks in the world.
expressionMeanings.11:
Expression Number 11 individuals carry visionary, intuitive, and inspiring energy. They have high-frequency consciousness and are strong in illuminating their environment. They often stand out in art, spiritual fields, or social guidance.

However, their intense energy can create anxiety, restlessness, or imbalance. When they balance themselves, they become a light that offers inspiration and guidance to their environment.
expressionMeanings.22:
Expression Number 22 individuals are known as master builders. They have the ability to transform great dreams into concrete success. Thanks to their disciplined, visionary, and practical nature, they can sign great projects in society.

However, this great energy can create responsibility pressure. When they don't settle for small goals and realize their visions, they leave lasting legacies in the world.
expressionMeanings.33:
Expression Number 33 individuals carry unconditional love, compassion, and healing energy. They are people who live for the good of others, are teachers and guides. They become a light that inspires, heals, and guides their environment.

However, this intense energy can turn into burnout or excessive sense of responsibility. When they remain balanced, they become powerful guides who bring lasting love and healing to society.

personalityMeanings.1:
Personality Number 1 individuals are perceived as determined, confident, and leader-spirited from the outside. People see them as strong, self-assured, and courageous characters. They radiate authority when they speak and naturally draw attention in their environment.

However, this energy can sometimes be perceived as authoritarian, arrogant, or overly self-centered by others. When they develop a softer and more sharing attitude, they become natural leaders who inspire others.
personalityMeanings.2:
Personality Number 2 individuals appear gentle, harmonious, and sensitive from the outside. They easily connect with others, radiate compassionate and understanding energy. They generally present a warm, trustworthy, and cooperative image in their environment.

However, excessive search for harmony can cause them to be perceived as passive or indecisive by others. When they clearly define their boundaries, they have both a gentle and strong stance.
personalityMeanings.3:
Personality Number 3 individuals appear energetic, social, and creative from the outside. They illuminate their environment with their cheerful attitudes and add joy to their surroundings with their humorous personalities. People know them as strong communicators, fun, and outspoken.

However, this energy can sometimes be perceived as too scattered, superficial, or careless. When they focus, they become powerful figures who bring joy and inspiration to the outside world.
personalityMeanings.4:
Personality Number 4 individuals are perceived as serious, disciplined, and reliable from the outside. People know them as solid, determined, and hardworking individuals. In the outside world, they generally present a responsible, planned, and organized character.

However, this energy can sometimes be seen as rigid, stubborn, or overly rule-bound. When they become more flexible and adaptable, they become personalities that are both trustworthy and easy to communicate with.
personalityMeanings.5:
Personality Number 5 individuals appear dynamic, free-spirited, and energetic from the outside. They carry an innovative, mobile, and adventurous aura. People know them as lively, open to change, and discovery-loving individuals.

However, this energy can sometimes be perceived as unbalanced, impatient, or unreliable. When they balance their desire for freedom with responsibility consciousness, they become an adventurous spirit that inspires the outside world.
personalityMeanings.6:
Personality Number 6 individuals present a gentle, elegant, and supportive image from the outside. They are known as loving, high aesthetic understanding, and harmonious individuals. People perceive them as trustworthy, compassionate, and balanced figures.

However, this energy can sometimes reflect as overly interfering, self-sacrificing, or critical. When they protect their own boundaries, they become strong personalities who bring peace and trust to others.
personalityMeanings.7:
Personality Number 7 individuals are perceived as mysterious, thoughtful, and deep from the outside. They carry a quiet, intuitive, and intellectual aura. People see them as wise, research-oriented, and spiritually strong individuals.

However, this energy can sometimes be perceived as distant, cold, or introverted. When they open their hearts, they become personalities who inspire their environment with their wisdom.
personalityMeanings.8:
Personality Number 8 individuals appear strong, authoritative, and charismatic from the outside. They present an impressive stance in business or communities. People perceive them as disciplined, determined, and powerful figures.

However, this energy can sometimes create an overly oppressive, ambitious, or distant image. When they balance power with justice, they become strong leaders who bring trust and inspiration to their environment.
personalityMeanings.9:
Personality Number 9 individuals appear compassionate, artistic, and idealistic from the outside. They carry energy that is willing to help people, inspiring, and sensitive. They are generally known as humane, artistic, and visionary figures in their environment.

However, this energy can sometimes be perceived as too dreamy, emotional, or fragile. When they combine realism with idealism, they become healing and inspiring personalities in the outside world.
personalityMeanings.11:
Personality Number 11 individuals appear charismatic, intuitive, and inspiring from the outside. They carry a high energy frequency and radiate light to their environment. People perceive them with a visionary, spiritual, and different aura.

However, this energy can sometimes be seen as difficult to understand, unbalanced, or overly sensitive by others. When they are balanced, they offer strong inspiration and guidance to their environment.
personalityMeanings.22:
Personality Number 22 individuals are perceived as visionary, determined, and strong builders from the outside. They carry a disciplined, practical, and impressive aura within the community. People see them as individuals who build solid projects, are trustworthy, and have vision.

However, this energy can sometimes be perceived as heavy, distant, or overly controlling by others. When they are balanced, they become powerful figures who create lasting values in society.
personalityMeanings.33:
Personality Number 33 individuals present a compassionate, teaching, and healing image from the outside. They carry an aura of unconditional love, understanding, and trust to their environment. People see them as guides, supporters, and sources of wisdom.

However, this energy can sometimes create an image of being overly self-sacrificing, self-neglecting, or taking excessive responsibility. When they remain balanced, they become strong personalities who both bring healing to their environment and inspire.

maturityMeanings.1:
Maturity Number 1 individuals feel the themes of independence, leadership, and charting their own path more strongly in the second half of their lives. During this period, they find great opportunities to express their potential, make new beginnings, and lead. Their inner strength makes them the captain of their own lives.

However, this energy can sometimes reflect as loneliness, authoritarianism, or impatience. When they learn to cooperate with others and balance their individuality with harmony, they become visionary leaders who inspire society.
maturityMeanings.2:
Maturity Number 2 individuals experience themes of harmony, balance, and cooperation in their advancing years. During this period, diplomacy, partnerships, and emotional bonds come to the fore. Their hearts turn toward creating peace and understanding.

However, excessive sensitivity or dependence on others can be the shadow side of this process. When they recognize their own values and protect their boundaries, they become guides who bring peace and love to their environment.
maturityMeanings.3:
For Maturity Number 3 individuals, the second half of life is a period of creativity, expression, and inspiration. The desire to stand out more in art, writing, communication, or social fields emerges. These individuals choose to live their lives more joyfully and energetically.

However, superficiality or disorganization can be the shadow side of this process. When they develop discipline, they become inspiring individuals who touch others' hearts with their expressive power.
maturityMeanings.4:
Maturity Number 4 individuals experience themes of discipline, order, and structure building in their advancing years. During this period, creating stability, building lasting projects, and proving their reliability come to the fore. They achieve lasting success by working patiently.

However, excessive rigidity, resistance to change, or over-control tendencies can be shadow aspects. When they develop flexibility, they build a strong structure that gives confidence to both themselves and others.
maturityMeanings.5:
For Maturity Number 5 individuals, the second half of life is full of freedom, change, and discoveries. During this period, new cultures, new experiences, and adventures await them. Thanks to their flexible nature, they easily embrace life's transformations.

However, impatience or instability can be the shadow side of this process. When they balance freedom with responsibility, their lives become an inspiring journey for both themselves and others.
maturityMeanings.6:
Maturity Number 6 individuals experience themes of family, love, and responsibility more intensely in the second half of their lives. For them, this period is about spending more time with loved ones, serving society, and creating beauty. Aesthetics, harmony, and compassion are the keys to this period.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or taking on others' problems can tire them. When they learn to also consider their own needs, they become a power that heals both themselves and their environment.
maturityMeanings.7:
For Maturity Number 7 individuals, advancing years pass with spiritual depth, research, and wisdom seeking. During this period, more introspection, learning, and spiritual discoveries come to the fore. Solitude becomes not a burden but a source of wisdom for them.

However, excessive introversion or distancing tendencies can be shadow aspects. When they share their wisdom with others, they become guides who illuminate their environment.
maturityMeanings.8:
Maturity Number 8 individuals face themes of power, management, and material success in the second half of their lives. During this period, they can reach influential positions in business or communities. Thanks to their determination, they have the potential to create abundance and prosperity.

However, excessive ambition, desire for control, or authoritarianism can be the shadow side of this process. When they balance material success with spirituality, they become both strong and fair leaders.
maturityMeanings.9:
For Maturity Number 9 individuals, advancing years are shaped by themes of compassion, idealism, and service to humanity. They value touching others' lives, leaving a mark in the world, and contributing through artistic/humanitarian projects.

However, excessive idealism or self-sacrifice can be shadow aspects. When they combine realism with their idealism, they become inspiring and healing figures in society.
maturityMeanings.11:
Maturity Number 11 individuals feel the themes of intuition, vision, and spiritual guidance more intensely in the second half of their lives. This period is full of inspiring projects and opportunities to illuminate others for them.

However, intense energy can create anxiety or imbalance. When they balance themselves, they become powerful figures who guide society and offer a high vision.
maturityMeanings.22:
For Maturity Number 22 individuals, advancing years become a period of creating great projects and lasting legacies. They have the potential to transform their dreams into reality and provide concrete contributions to society. Their disciplined and visionary nature becomes even stronger during this period.

However, heavy responsibility pressure can be a shadow aspect. When they don't settle for small goals, they become unforgettable figures by building lasting works in the world.
maturityMeanings.33:
Maturity Number 33 individuals feel the energy of unconditional love, compassion, and healing intensely in the second half of their lives. This period is full of opportunities to inspire others, teach, and heal society.

However, excessive responsibility or burnout can be shadow aspects. When they remain balanced, they become powerful healers who illuminate both their loved ones and society.

pinnaclesMeanings.1:
Pinnacle 1 shows that the theme of independence and leadership strongly emerges in a person's life. During this period, the person makes new beginnings and takes bold steps to chart their own path. The spark within creates opportunities for individual achievements and entrepreneurship.

However, there is a risk of being too self-centered or authoritarian during this period. Learning to cooperate with others, expanding vision, and balancing independence with harmony brings out the best potential of this pinnacle.
pinnaclesMeanings.2:
Pinnacle 2 shows that opportunities for harmony, partnerships, and cooperation increase in a person's life. This period is ideal for building deep bonds in relationships, ensuring peace, and developing diplomatic skills.

However, excessive sensitivity, indecision, or dependency tendencies may occur during this process. When healthy boundaries are maintained, the person achieves great success with others and becomes a force that brings peace to their environment.
pinnaclesMeanings.3:
Pinnacle 3 shows that creativity, expression, and social achievements come to the fore in a person's life. During this period, the person can stand out in art, communication, writing, or stage. It is a period of high energy, joy, and inspiration.

However, superficiality or disorganization can be obstructive during this process. When focused, creativity transforms into both personal and social light.
pinnaclesMeanings.4:
Pinnacle 4 shows that the theme of discipline, work, and order comes to the fore in a person's life. This period can be a time to lay solid foundations, create lasting projects, and take responsibility.

However, rigid rules or resistance to change can be the shadow side of this process. When flexibility is developed, Pinnacle 4 becomes the foundation of great stability and trust.
pinnaclesMeanings.5:
Pinnacle 5 shows that the energy of freedom, change, and discovery intensifies in a person's life. This period offers strong opportunities to gain new experiences, travel, or make radical transformations.

However, impatience and instability are the risks of this period. Balancing the desire for freedom with responsibility consciousness fully reveals the potential of Pinnacle 5.
pinnaclesMeanings.6:
Pinnacle 6 shows that the theme of family, responsibility, and love comes to the fore in a person's life. This period can be a time for harmony in relationships, creating aesthetics, and serving society.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or the tendency to take on others' problems can be exhausting. Maintaining balance by considering one's own needs reveals the light of this period.
pinnaclesMeanings.7:
Pinnacle 7 shows that the theme of spirituality, research, and wisdom strengthens in a person's life. During this period, the person turns more to their inner world, follows their intuitions, and questions the meaning of life.

However, excessive introversion or feelings of loneliness can be shadow aspects. Sharing wisdom with others transforms this pinnacle into a bright period.
pinnaclesMeanings.8:
Pinnacle 8 shows that the theme of power, success, and material prosperity comes to the fore in a person's life. This period can bring career advancement, leadership opportunities, and financial success.

However, excessive ambition, desire for control, or authoritarian attitudes can be the shadow side of this process. When balanced with spirituality, Pinnacle 8 opens the door to lasting achievements.
pinnaclesMeanings.9:
Pinnacle 9 intensely reveals the theme of compassion, service, and idealism in a person's life. This period can be a time to help others, engage in artistic work, and contribute to society.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or idealism can be shadow aspects. When combined with realism, Pinnacle 9 brings projects that leave lasting marks on the world.
pinnaclesMeanings.11:
Pinnacle 11 reveals the theme of inspiration, intuition, and vision in a person's life. This period is a time when spiritual awareness increases and inspiring projects come to the fore.

However, intense energy can create anxiety and restlessness. When balanced, Pinnacle 11 transforms into a guidance period that illuminates the environment.
pinnaclesMeanings.22:
Pinnacle 22 brings great projects, lasting legacies, and social contributions to the fore in a person's life. This period is a process where visions become reality and concrete achievements are made.

However, responsibility pressure or desire for control can be shadow aspects. When this energy is used in balance, the person leaves unforgettable marks in the world.
pinnaclesMeanings.33:
Pinnacle 33 shows that the themes of unconditional love, compassion, and service intensify in a person's life. This period is a strong opportunity to guide society, bring healing, and shine through teaching.

However, there may be risks of excessive responsibility or burnout. When balanced, Pinnacle 33 offers a powerful healing period that inspires society.

challengesMeanings.1:
Challenge 1 shows that a person needs to learn to develop their sense of self. During this process, lessons such as lack of self-confidence, indecision, or fear of independence may come to the fore.

When they learn to own their identity and express it courageously, the person finds their inner strength.
challengesMeanings.2:
Challenge 2 shows that a person needs to learn to establish balance and harmony in relationships. During this process, they may encounter lessons of excessive sensitivity, dependency, or indecision.

When they know their own worth and protect their boundaries, they build harmonious and loving relationships.
challengesMeanings.3:
Challenge 3 shows that a person needs to learn to develop their freedom of expression. During this process, lessons of shame, hiding oneself, or superficiality may come to the fore.

When they present their creativity with discipline, the person shines in an inspiring way.
challengesMeanings.4:
Challenge 4 shows that a person needs to learn discipline, patience, and order. During this process, they may encounter lessons of disorganization, laziness, or instability.

When they develop diligence and responsibility, they build a strong foundation.
challengesMeanings.5:
Challenge 5 shows that a person needs to learn to balance freedom with responsibility. During this process, excessive freedom seeking, impatience, or fear of attachment may come to the fore.

When they use their freedom consciously, their life becomes an inspiring journey.
challengesMeanings.6:
Challenge 6 shows that a person needs to learn the balance of responsibility and love in relationships. During this process, lessons of excessive self-sacrifice, interference, or criticism may come to the fore.

When they consider their own needs, they become a true source of healing and harmony.
challengesMeanings.7:
Challenge 7 shows that a person needs to develop their inner confidence and faith. During this process, lessons of loneliness, skepticism, or disconnection may come to the fore.

When they learn to trust their intuitions, they illuminate their environment with their wisdom.
challengesMeanings.8:
Challenge 8 shows that a person needs to learn their relationship with power, authority, and money. During this process, they may encounter lessons of ambition, control, or material dependency.

When they use power with justice, they become a true leader.
challengesMeanings.9:
Challenge 9 shows that a person needs to learn to let go and forgive. During this process, lessons of disappointments, excessive self-sacrifice, or holding onto the past may come to the fore.

When they learn to let go, they move forward in a wiser and freer way.

personalYearMeanings.1:
Personal Year 1 is a time of new beginnings, planting seeds, and starting a new cycle of life. This year, the person can courageously step into new projects, discover their individual power, and seize opportunities to chart their own path. This period is strong in terms of leadership, entrepreneurship, and individual expression.

However, impatience or loneliness can be the shadow aspects of this year. When slow and conscious steps are taken, Personal Year 1 enables the person to lay solid foundations that will shape their future.
personalYearMeanings.2:
Personal Year 2 is known as a time of patience, cooperation, and harmony. This year, relationships, partnerships, and emotional bonds come to the fore. The person goes through an appropriate period to receive support and act together with others. Diplomacy, understanding, and compassion stand out.

However, excessive sensitivity or indecision can be the shadow aspect of this year. When they protect their own boundaries and proceed with patience, Personal Year 2 brings lasting harmony in relationships.
personalYearMeanings.3:
Personal Year 3 is a period when creativity, expression, and joy come to the fore. This year, the person can shine in social relationships and stand out in art, writing, or communication. There is a flow of energy full of joy, fun, and inspiration.

However, superficiality or disorganization can be the shadow aspect of this year. When combined with focus and discipline, this period can transform into creative projects that will bring lasting success to the person's life.
personalYearMeanings.4:
Personal Year 4 is a year of work, discipline, and structure building. During this period, the person works patiently, acts in a planned manner, and lays lasting foundations. The desire to create stability and ensure security is in the foreground.

However, excessive rigidity or resistance to change can be the shadow aspect of this year. When worked with flexibility, Personal Year 4 forms the foundations of great achievements in the future.
personalYearMeanings.5:
Personal Year 5 is a year of freedom, change, and discovery. During this period, the person opens up to new experiences, meets different people, and adds excitement to their life. Travel, innovation, and radical transformations are the keys to this year.

However, impatience, instability, or fear of attachment can be the shadow aspects of this year. When freedom is balanced with responsibility, Personal Year 5 opens the door to great opportunities.
personalYearMeanings.6:
Personal Year 6 is a period when themes of family, responsibility, and love come to the fore. This year, the person spends more time with their loved ones, their desire to serve society increases, and their desire to create aesthetics strengthens. Harmony and compassion are the keys to this year.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or the tendency to take on others' problems can be exhausting. When balance is maintained by considering one's own needs, Personal Year 6 brings both peace and harmony.
personalYearMeanings.7:
Personal Year 7 is a period of inner depth, research, and spiritual discovery. This year, the person is in an ideal time to turn inward, listen to their intuitions, and question the meaning of life. Meditation, education, and research are supported during this period.

However, excessive loneliness or skepticism can be the shadow aspects of this year. When inner wisdom is shared with others, Personal Year 7 transforms into an enlightening period.
personalYearMeanings.8:
Personal Year 8 is a period when the energy of power, success, and abundance comes to the fore. This year, the person can experience career advancement, achieve financial success, and seize leadership opportunities. Determination and discipline are the foundation of this period.

However, excessive ambition or desire for control can be the shadow aspects of this year. When material success is balanced with spiritual values, Personal Year 8 brings lasting prosperity.
personalYearMeanings.9:
Personal Year 9 is a period of completion and letting go. This year, the person can resolve bonds from the past, leave old habits, and make room for a new cycle in their life. Compassion, idealism, and service to humanity are the keys to this period.

However, excessive emotionality or getting stuck in the past can be the shadow aspects of this year. When they learn to let go, Personal Year 9 brings great transformation and inner freedom.

compatibilityMeanings.1:
When one or both parties in a relationship have the number 1, a strong leadership and independence energy dominates. This bond contains passion, dynamism, and entrepreneurship. It adds vitality to the relationship and the couple can support each other in new beginnings.

However, conflicts can arise when both parties are too controlling or stubborn. Mutual respect and cooperation are essential to balance this energy; thus, the relationship transforms into both a strong and inspiring journey.
compatibilityMeanings.2:
The number 2 in a relationship brings harmony, balance, and sensitivity. The emotional bond between the couple becomes strong; the parties are inclined to understand, support, and act together. This energy increases romance and intimacy.

However, excessive sensitivity or dependency can harm the relationship. When the parties protect their own boundaries, the 2 energy creates a loving and lasting union.
compatibilityMeanings.3:
The number 3 in a relationship brings joy, communication, and creativity. The couple succeeds in having fun together, socializing, and making life enjoyable. There is a humorous, positive, and artistic energy in their bond.

However, superficiality or excessive disorganization can harm the relationship. When they focus, the 3 energy adds inspiration and happiness to the relationship.
compatibilityMeanings.4:
The number 4 in a relationship brings stability, trust, and responsibility. The couple can build a solid foundation together, make long-term plans, and establish a secure life. This energy strengthens commitment and durability.

However, excessive rigidity or stubbornness can create problems. When supported with flexibility, the 4 energy brings lasting trust and loyalty to the relationship.
compatibilityMeanings.5:
The number 5 in a relationship brings freedom, excitement, and adventure. The couple experiences new experiences together, travels, and adds color to their lives. Dynamism and movement stand out in the relationship.

However, excessive desire for freedom can lead to attachment issues. When balance is achieved with responsibility consciousness, the 5 energy carries inspiration and passion to the relationship.
compatibilityMeanings.6:
The number 6 in a relationship brings love, harmony, and family energy. A compassionate, responsible, and balanced bond forms between the couple. This energy increases trust and commitment, strengthening the desire to start a family.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or interference can create problems. With a balance that also considers one's own needs, the 6 energy offers a compassionate and lasting relationship.
compatibilityMeanings.7:
The number 7 in a relationship brings depth, spirituality, and wisdom. An intuitive and intellectual bond forms between the couple. This energy supports intimate conversations, inner discoveries, and spiritual closeness in the relationship.

However, excessive introversion or distance can create problems. When emotional openness is achieved, the 7 energy creates a spiritual partnership.
compatibilityMeanings.8:
The number 8 in a relationship brings power, success, and determination energy. The couple can become a strong team to achieve their goals together. Financial success and social status can stand out in this bond.

However, excessive ambition or desire for control can lead to conflicts. When they balance power with justice, the 8 energy creates lasting success and prosperity in the relationship.
compatibilityMeanings.9:
The number 9 in a relationship brings compassion, idealism, and self-sacrifice energy. The couple may want to do beneficial work for humanity together or participate in artistic projects. This energy increases romance and sensitivity.

However, excessive self-sacrifice or idealism can be problematic. When combined with realism, the 9 energy creates a loving and inspiring relationship.
compatibilityMeanings.11:
The number 11 in a relationship brings high intuition, vision, and spiritual connection. There can be deep understanding, telepathic feeling, and a strong spiritual bond between the couple. This energy transforms love into a spiritual experience.

However, intense energy can create anxiety or imbalance. When they are balanced, the 11 energy transforms love into an inspiring light.
compatibilityMeanings.22:
The number 22 in a relationship carries the energy of great visions, lasting projects, and a strong partnership. The couple can build lasting structures in their lives together, strengthening both materially and spiritually.

However, heavy responsibility or excessive desire for control can be problematic. When balanced, the 22 energy transforms the relationship into a lasting and powerful partnership.
compatibilityMeanings.33:
The number 33 in a relationship carries unconditional love, compassion, and healing energy. The couple approaches each other with deep commitment and self-sacrifice. This bond can create a teaching, healing, and inspiring relationship.

However, there is a risk of excessive self-sacrifice or burnout. When healthy boundaries are maintained, the 33 energy transforms love into a transformative healing.

modals.aboutSpreadText: The career spread is designed to clarify uncertainties in your work and career journey, and to make your strengths, obstacles, and opportunities visible. Before you start, set your intention, choose the cards with your intuition, and read each card's interpretation according to its position; this way you can turn insights into concrete actions.
modals.cardCountText: This spread is done with 7 cards. Each card represents a different area of career and provides you with personalized guidance.
modals.detailedReadingText: With audio reading, you can listen to the meanings of the cards and get more detailed interpretations.
modals.writtenReadingText: With written reading, you can read the meanings of the cards and get more comprehensive analyses.
modals.step1: Fill in your personal information and questions
modals.step3: Read the interpretations according to the positions of the cards
modals.step4: Save your reading and get the results

problemSolving.name: Problem Solving Spread
problemSolving.description: 10-card detailed spread for problem analysis and solution

1.title: Question Asked
1.description: The main question or topic that forms the basis of the spread

2.title: Obstacle of the Problem
2.description: The main obstacle or difficulty in front of the problem

3.title: Subconscious Issue History
3.description: The subconscious origins or past influences of the topic

4.title: Best Potential
4.description: The best situation we can achieve for ourselves in this matter

5.title: Near Past
5.description: Events or influences related to the topic in the near past

6.title: Near Future
6.description: Possible developments related to the topic in the near future

7.title: Current Situation
7.description: Our current state, our current condition regarding the topic

8.title: External Influences
8.description: External factors affecting the topic, environmental conditions

9.title: Fears and Worries
9.description: Our internal fears and concerns related to the topic

10.title: Outcome of the Event
10.description: The final outcome of the topic or event, possible solution

love.name: Love Spread
love.description: Special 4-card spread for love and relationship topics

career.name: Career Spread
career.description: Special 7-card spread for career and work life

1.title: Is this really the career I want?
1.description: Evaluate whether your current career is really the career you want

2.title: What steps can I take to develop my career?
2.description: Concrete steps you can take to advance your career

3.title: Are there aspects of my career that I cannot change?
3.description: Elements in your career that you cannot control or change

4.title: Am I doing my best in my career?
4.description: The level of performance and effort you show in your current career

5.title: What changes can I make to help my career?
5.description: Changes and improvements that will contribute positively to your career

6.title: What obstacles from my past are affecting my current career?
6.description: How your past experiences affect your current career

7.title: What will be the outcome?
7.description: The general outcome of your career journey and future predictions

situationAnalysis.name: Situation Analysis Spread
situationAnalysis.description: Special 7-card spread for situation analysis and evaluation

1.title: Past or Causes
1.description: The causes of the situation experienced, why such a situation is currently being experienced and all the mistakes made are indicated in this card.

2.title: Current Situation
2.description: What is currently happening, current agenda topics and how the past affects today is indicated.

3.title: Hidden Factors
3.description: Events developing outside the person's knowledge, those talking behind, secret affairs and unknown truths are hidden in this card.

4.title: Center Card
4.description: Represents the center of the spread. It expresses the person at the center of the situation or the most central area in your life.

5.title: External Factors
5.description: Provides information from different sources and perspectives for the future. It can also point to external attacks and possible intrigues.

6.title: Advice
6.description: Provides information about what the most appropriate actions are regarding the experienced situation. It is stated that it may offer a solution or way out.

7.title: Possible Future - Result
7.description: Shows where the current course will lead, possible obstacles or surprises. It is stated that the future can change depending on the decisions to be made.

relationshipAnalysis.name: Relationship Analysis Spread
relationshipAnalysis.description: Special 7-card spread for relationship analysis and evaluation

1.title: Current Situation
1.description: Provides information about the current conditions of the relationship, the situation it is in and the atmosphere created by any problems.

2.title: Your Feelings
2.description: Shows your feelings, thoughts and your perspective on your partner. It reflects your emotional state in the relationship.

3.title: Your Expectations
3.description: Shows your concerns, expectations and dreams about your relationship or the situation you are in.

4.title: Advice
4.description: Contains advice regarding the attitude you will display regarding the course of your relationship. It shows how you should behave.

5.title: Road Map
5.description: Guides you regarding the attitude you should take in this relationship or in the face of existing problems and what kind of path you should follow.

6.title: Your Partner's Expectations
6.description: Shows your partner's concerns, expectations and dreams about your relationship or the situation you are in.

7.title: Your Partner's Feelings
7.description: Shows your partner's feelings, thoughts and perspective on you. It reflects their emotional state in the relationship.

relationshipProblems.name: Relationship Problems Spread
relationshipProblems.description: Special 9-card spread for relationship problems analysis and solution

1.title: What is the contradiction?
1.description: Shows the internal contradictions and conflicts in your relationship. It helps you understand what topics you disagree on and why you experience contradiction.

2.title: What is the problem?
2.description: Reveals the main problem and basic issue in your relationship. It shows which topic creates the biggest difficulty.

3.title: Did I create the problem?
3.description: Shows your share and responsibility at the source of the problem. It helps you understand how your own behavior contributed to the problem.

4.title: Am I ignoring my share in this problem?
4.description: Shows your situation regarding accepting your own responsibility. It reveals whether you ignore your own mistakes.

5.title: My past experiences with the person I'm with
5.description: Shows how the past experiences you had with your partner affect current problems. It helps you understand how the past reflects on today.

6.title: Are we abusing each other?
6.description: Shows the state of mutual respect and healthy boundaries in your relationship. It reveals how you affect each other and whether you harm each other.

7.title: Are there other people interfering with our problem?
7.description: Shows external factors and third parties affecting your relationship. It helps you understand how family, friends or other people affect your problem.

8.title: Are there material problems affecting our relationship?
8.description: Shows the effect of factors such as money, work, financial situation on your relationship. It reveals how economic problems affect your relationship.

9.title: Will this relationship continue?
9.description: Provides insight into the future of your relationship. It provides information about whether current problems will be resolved and whether the relationship will continue.

marriage.name: Marriage Spread
marriage.description: Special 10-card spread for marriage and finding a spouse

1.title: What will be the outcome?
1.description: Shows the general outcome of your marriage process and how it will progress.

2.title: What should I do while waiting for my spouse?
2.description: Shows how you should develop yourself until you find the right person.

3.title: Will we share our financial resources with each other?
3.description: Shows your harmony and sharing in financial matters in marriage.

4.title: Will both of us want to commit?
4.description: Shows whether both parties are ready for marriage and the desire to commit.

5.title: Will we have similarities?
5.description: Shows your common values, similarities and harmony.

6.title: Will this person's family accept me?
6.description: Shows how family approval and family relationships will be.

7.title: How will we find each other?
7.description: Shows how you will meet and find the right person.

8.title: Will we be able to get along?
8.description: Shows your communication harmony and capacity to understand each other.

9.title: What kind of spouse is suitable for me?
9.description: Shows the characteristics of your ideal spouse and the person who will be compatible with you.

10.title: Will I be able to get married?
10.description: Shows your marriage potential and chances of getting married.

newLover.name: New Lover Spread
newLover.description: Special 6-card spread for a new love relationship

1.title: Will I experience a new relationship soon?

2.title: What zodiac sign will this person be?
2.description: Shows the astrological characteristics of your future partner

3.title: Will we be compatible with each other?
3.description: Shows harmony and disharmony in your relationship

4.title: Will it be a long-term relationship?
4.description: Shows the continuity and depth of your relationship

5.title: Could this person be my soulmate?
5.description: Shows spiritual connection and deep love potential

6.title: Will my wish come true?
6.description: Shows the probability of your love wish coming true

money.name: Money Spread
money.description: Pyramid spread with 8 cards for financial situation and money matters

1.title: Money-Related Concerns
1.description: Is there any concern about money?

3.title: Money Usage
3.description: How can I use money in a way that will make me happy?

5.title: Financial Responsibilities
5.description: What are my responsibilities for a good life financially?

6.title: New Financial Plans
6.description: My new plans regarding my financial investments or savings

8.title: Money-Making Abilities
8.description: What special talents do I have for making money?

data.detailedReadingTitle: Situation Analysis Spread - Detailed Personal Reading

form.concernQuestion: What situation do you want to analyze?
form.understandingQuestion: What do you want to understand with this situation analysis?
form.emotionalQuestion: How are you feeling right now about this situation?

modals.aboutSpreadText: This 7-card spread is designed to deeply analyze the situation you are experiencing. It provides comprehensive information about the past, present, hidden factors and future.
modals.cardCountText: This spread uses 7 tarot cards. Each card represents a different aspect of the situation.
modals.detailedReadingText: Provides comprehensive analysis with detailed interpretations of cards and position meanings.
modals.writtenReadingText: Reading results are sent to your email address in PDF format.
modals.creditConfirmMessage: Do you want to continue with this reading?
modals.successMessage: Your situation analysis spread has been saved and analyzed in detail. You can view your results from the user panel.

position1.upright: The person you're interested in is attractive, talented, and has the power to achieve what they want. They have high communication skills and know how to turn events in their favor. They may be creating a conscious attraction towards you.
position1.reversed: Reversed Magician indicates that this person might be manipulative, deceptive, or not using their potential. Their words and actions may not be consistent, or they may be suffering from lack of self-confidence.
position1.context: This person is a creator sitting in the director's chair of their life and relationships.

position1.upright: This person has a mysterious, intuitive nature and doesn't immediately reveal their emotions. Their inner world is rich and it may take time to understand them. They may be keeping their feelings for you like a secret.
position1.reversed: Reversed High Priestess shows that this person might be secretive, disconnected from their intuition, or not sincere with you. They may be having trouble connecting with their inner world or with you.
position1.context: This person is a mysterious soul who lives their emotions not on the surface, but in the depths.

position1.upright: The person you're interested in is nurturing, compassionate, warm-hearted, and loves the pleasures of life. They spread beauty and abundance around them. In relationships, they may have a maternal or paternal attitude that provides security.
position1.reversed: Reversed Empress shows that this person might be overly possessive, lazy, or not taking care of themselves. They may have blockages in expressing their creativity or love.
position1.context: This person is a life-filled heart that nourishes with love and compassion.

position1.upright: This person has an organized, disciplined, protective, and leadership-oriented nature. They seek stability and control in their life. In relationships, they can offer a reliable shoulder and a solid foundation.
position1.reversed: Reversed Emperor indicates that this person might be overly controlling, rigid, dominant, or have problems with authority. They may have difficulty showing their emotions.
position1.context: This person is a leader who wants to build their life and relationships on solid foundations.

position1.upright: The person you're interested in is traditional, has high moral values, and values social rules. They may be seeking seriousness, loyalty, and a traditional path in relationships.
position1.reversed: Reversed Hierophant shows that this person might be rebellious against rules, dogmatic, or narrow-minded. They may be feeling social pressure or rejecting traditional paths.
position1.context: This person lives love and life with a specific belief or value system.

position1.upright: This person is at an important turning point regarding relationships and partnerships. They are someone who acts with their heart, is full of love, and is open to forming a deep bond with a partner. They may feel a strong spiritual attraction to you.
position1.reversed: Reversed Lovers shows that this person is experiencing indecision in relationships, making wrong choices, or is in conflict between their heart and mind. There may be discord and communication problems.
position1.context: This person is seeking their heart's path and is on the verge of making an important relationship decision.

position1.upright: The person you're interested in is ambitious, willful, and focused on their goals. They have taken control of their life and are moving forward rapidly. If they want a relationship, they will direct themselves to this goal with determination.
position1.reversed: Reversed Chariot shows that this person has uncontrolled, aimless, or aggressive energy. They may have lost the steering wheel of their life or given up in the face of obstacles.
position1.context: This person is a warrior who drives the car of their life determinedly toward their goals.

position1.upright: This person has inner strength, courage, and patience. Instead of brute force, they overcome difficulties with compassion and understanding. They are a character who can control their wild impulses, gentle but strong.
position1.reversed: Reversed Strength shows that this person is insecure, cowardly, or governed by their inner impulses. They may be using their strength incorrectly or feeling weak.
position1.context: This person is a brave heart who knows that true strength lies in kindness and patience.

position1.upright: The person you're interested in is introverted, in spiritual search, and needs solitude. They may be distant from relationships right now and seeking their inner guidance.
position1.reversed: Reversed Hermit shows that this person has forcibly isolated themselves from society, fears loneliness, or refuses to listen to others' advice. They may be lost in isolation.
position1.context: This person is a wise traveler who seeks answers not outside, but within themselves.

position1.upright: This person is in an important turning point and cycle of change in their life. The winds of fate are blowing for them. Sudden and unexpected developments may occur in their relationship life as well.
position1.reversed: Reversed Wheel of Fortune shows that this person is going through an unlucky period, resisting change, or feeling they have lost control of their life. Things may be going wrong for them.
position1.context: This person is in the middle of life's ups and downs, at a point where the wheel of fate is turning.

position1.upright: The person you're interested in is fair, honest, logical, and balanced. They seek truth and transparency in their life and relationships. They may be facing the consequences of their past actions.
position1.reversed: Reversed Justice shows that this person is acting unfairly, avoiding responsibility, or being prejudiced. There may be an imbalance or injustice in their life.
position1.context: This person is a soul who believes that life and love should sit in a fair balance.

position1.upright: This person is in a pause period to gain a different perspective on events. They may be making a sacrifice or waiting on a matter. They prefer to observe rather than act right now.
position1.reversed: Reversed Hanged Man shows that this person is making useless sacrifices, stuck in a situation, or resisting change. They may be wasting their time and energy.
position1.context: This person is someone who needs to stop and look at the world with different eyes to move forward.

position1.upright: This person is going through a great transformation and ending process in their life. They are preparing to leave the old behind and make a new beginning. This could be the end of a relationship or a personal transformation.
position1.reversed: Reversed Death shows that this person is resisting change, stuck in the past, or delaying a necessary ending. This situation is preventing their progress.
position1.context: This person is a phoenix who leaves an old self behind to be reborn from the ashes.

position1.upright: This person has found balance, harmony, and moderation in their life. They create a peaceful synthesis by bringing different elements together. In relationships, they have a patient, calm, and conciliatory attitude.
position1.reversed: Reversed Temperance shows that this person is experiencing imbalance, excess, or conflict in their life. They may be acting impatiently and have lost their inner peace.
position1.context: This person is an alchemist who creates their own melody of peace by combining the different notes of life.

position1.upright: This person may be tightly bound to materialistic pleasures, addictions, or unhealthy relationship dynamics. Although they have intense passion, this situation can become restrictive or toxic.
position1.reversed: Reversed Devil shows that this person has freed themselves from an addiction, broken their chains, or realized a trap. They are taking an important step on the path to liberation.
position1.context: This person is either a prisoner of a cage they created or found themselves in, or someone trying to escape that cage.

position1.upright: This person is experiencing sudden, shocking, and unexpected destruction in their life. The foundations they believed in are shaking, and they are seeing the truth with sudden enlightenment. Although this process is painful, it is liberating.
position1.reversed: Reversed Tower shows that this person is avoiding a necessary destruction, trying to prevent a disaster, or the crisis is prolonging because they are resisting change. They are living in fear of destruction.
position1.context: This person is someone facing truths while the tower they thought was solid in their life is collapsing.

position1.upright: This person is full of hope, inspiration, and faith after a difficult period. They look positively to the future and are in a process of spiritual healing. Their heart is open and optimistic towards relationships.
position1.reversed: Reversed Star shows that this person has lost hope, is pessimistic, or disconnected from their sources of inspiration. They have lost faith in the future and feel lost.
position1.context: This person is a guiding star of hope that shines after a dark night.

position1.upright: This person is going through a period full of uncertainties, fears, and illusions. Although their intuitions are strong, they may have difficulty distinguishing between what is real and what is fantasy. They have an emotionally confusing energy.
position1.reversed: Reversed Moon shows that this person is facing their fears, a deception has been revealed, or the confusion has ended. Secrets are coming out and clarity is being gained.
position1.context: This person is an intuitive but anxious soul trying to find their way in their own inner darkness.

position1.upright: This person is full of joy, vitality, success, and positive energy. They enjoy their life, have confidence in themselves, and spread light around them. In relationships, they are open, honest, and warm-hearted.
position1.reversed: Reversed Sun indicates that this person is experiencing temporary unhappiness, their energy is low, or they cannot fully show their potential. They may have difficulty seeing success and joy.
position1.context: This person is a shining sun that spreads warmth and happiness around them.

position1.upright: This person is in an important accounting and rebirth period in their life. They are evaluating the past, forgiving themselves, and awakening to a higher purpose. In relationships, there may be a second chance or an important decision.
position1.reversed: Reversed Judgement shows that this person is judging themselves or others, not learning from past mistakes, or avoiding an important decision. They may be overly critical of themselves.
position1.context: This person is someone who hears a call to face their past and open a new page in their life.

position1.upright: This person has successfully completed a cycle in their life and reached wholeness. They are at peace with themselves, satisfied, and ready to move to a new stage. In relationships, they also seek a sense of completion and satisfaction.
position1.reversed: Reversed World shows that this person cannot complete a project or cycle, cannot reach their goals, and feels that something is missing. They may not be able to make closure.
position1.context: This person has successfully completed an important stage in their life journey and feels at the peak of the world.
